RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 28 Allowed 4lbs. Cla iming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORNER OFFICE trailed for a half, circled her field rapidly in the four path through the stretch and was along in time. GIV'EM THE BIZ broke in front, set all the pace, widened into the stretch then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. HOPPY GILMORE stalked the pace and went evenly. FIRSTHAND JUSTICE well placed, failed to respond. STRIKE ONE pressed the early pace along the rail, angled out two wide on the turn, remained a sharp threat into the stretch and gave way late.

ENTRY.NAME: Strike One
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, shifted 2 wide turn, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Firsthand Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Giv'em the Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, drew off upper stretch, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Corner Office
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, closed fast 4path, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Hoppy Gilmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 28. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANNFORD broke in full stride to set all the pace and finished full of run under confident handling to win going away. OL' L B never far back, rallied three wide through the turn and into the stretch to be clear for second. WEEKEND BUZZ stalked the pace two wide for a half, altered course outside at the top of the stretch giving up ground the passed a tiring rival late. OHIO PLAYER pressured the winner along the rail into the stretch and gave way late. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin On Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Buzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2w, altered course outside top lane, passed tiring foe

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Mannford
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Ol' L B
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied 3 wide, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 19. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAR ON THE RIVER away alertly, set all the pace, drew off in upper stretch and prevailed under a strong hand ride. PRESSLEY RIDGE never far back, closed willingly three wide through the turn and stretch in the four path and finished clear for second while steadily cutting into the winners advantage late. RAISE YOU ONE had good early speed two wide, dropped back on the turn, drifted out to the seven path entering the stretch and improved position late. ORVILLE B offered a mild bid two wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. WHY KENNY WHY was no factor. MARQUITOS M pressured the winner along the inside into the turn and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Marquitos M
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Raise You One
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 2w, dropped back turn, drifted 7path upper stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Why Kenny Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: War On the River
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew clear top lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Orville B
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Pressley Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 3 wide, 4path, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 28 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DERBY INCLUDED saved ground through the far turn, shifted out to the four path at the three sixteenths pole, rallied steadily through the stretch under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. MASTER OF WAR unhurried into the stretch, closed willingly along the rail late and got up for second. MUGSY MALONE sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch then was outfinished while two wide. SAMMY'S SMILE allowed to settle, found his best stride late outside. DISTORTED LIMITS chased the pace in the three path and went evenly. ACROSS THE AISLE trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy's Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Malone
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace late stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Derby Included
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled 4path 3/16pole, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Across the Aisle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Distorted Limits
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3path, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Master of War
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed willingly rail, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 28 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less N ot Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AZTEC away alertly, set all the pace under pressure, turned back a strong bid from the runner up in upper stretch, dug in gamely and drew away late under left handed urging. CENTSOFWANDER saved ground through the far turn, shifted to the four path entering the stretch, reeled in the winner before the furlong marker then was denied while clear for second. R CARDINAL PRINCE went up to press the pace two wide before a half then was outfinished. CYCLONE hopped hitting the gate ate the start and was no threat. BOSS BEAR close up four wide, failed to respond. CAPTURE MI chased the winner three wide through the far turn then faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, altered course 4path 3/16pole, loomed, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, hit gate start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Aztec
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, repulsed bid, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Capture Mi
ENTRY.OWNER: Prostar 10 Stables Inc and The Four Horsemen Racing Stable Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNOCK WOOD dueled for the lead two wide for a half, drew clear quickly in upper stretch and proved best under brisk handling. EL SORDO with the second flight two wide, had a mild late rally in the three path and finished clear for second. HARSH TRUTH trailed until deep stretch then passed tiring rivals outside. ROUGE TU RICHES with the second flight inside, weakened in the stretch. MILAGRO DE JOVANNI battled with the winner along the inside for a half, had speed until mid stretch and stopped late.

ENTRY.NAME: Milagro de Jovanni
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, stopped late

ENTRY.NAME: Knock Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, drew clear upper stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: El Sordo
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, mild rally 3path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Rouge Tu Riches
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Harsh Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COMPLY allowed to settle, saved ground, got through under a strong hand ride and was up in final strides. STAR HAWK stalked the pace into the stretch, loomed boldly three wide before the furlong marker then couldn't handle the winner. STATESBORO set a pressured pace until deep stretch and was outfinished while two wide. OAKS HONEY failed to menace. INDIAN FEVER pressed the pace two wide for six furlongs then faded in the stretch. SO DIALED IN moved up three wide into the far turn then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Star Hawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 3 wide upper stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Comply
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, got through, long drive, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Oaks Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: So Dialed In
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Statesboro
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, outfinished 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Fever
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 28 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERGER sped to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and maintained her advantage under confident handling. HELLO SWEETS never far back, rallied along the inside into the stretch, was bumped before the furlong marker and dug in gamely for second. NEXT GENERATION chased the pace three wide, ducked in when struck repeatedly with a right handed crop bumping SUGAR LOVES IT into HELLO SWEETS before the eighth pole then was outfinished. SPICE ICE failed to menace. SUGAR LOVES IT chased the winner two wide, was bumped by NEST GENERATION and forced into HELLO SWEETS in upper stretch causing her rider to checked hard and lost momentum. SORORITY SISTER with the second flight three wide, was through after a half. THE BOOK OF RUTH had good early speed along the inside then wilted on the turn. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF SUGAR LOVES IT LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF NEXT GENERATION FOR INTERFERENCE IN UPPER STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED NEXT GENERATION AND PLACED HER FIFTH.

ENTRY.NAME: The Book of Ruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Spice Ice
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Serger
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pace, held well, confident handling

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Loves It
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, bumped between horses upper stretch, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Sweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rail bid, bumped upper stretch, gamely 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Next Generation
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, ducked in right whip upper stretch, bumped, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Sorority Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, through after half,
